page.title: 07OYLERS FARM
page.content: OYLERS FARM In May 1985 a group of children went to Oylers Farm. The farm is a family run concern. Oylers Farm covers 120 acres. This year,1985,the farmer told us it was a bad year because of the unusually cold winter. The farmer has a small fleet of vans which carry all his produce to market. The farmer grows barley,wheat,spring onions,cabbages,potatoes,lettuces,spri ng greens and sweetcorn. He takes these to Spitalfield Market and sells them for a good price. In the summer when all the harvesting has to be done he hires some students to help.
